safetyTips: Social distancing in packing and collection.  Gloves and masks worn by packers and drivers.
name: KENT FOOD HUBS CIC
description: Kent Food Hubs runs and supports local online markets that make supermarkets pointless. This is where you can buy and sell food and other products and simply live a better life for the 21st century. We sell food either produced in Kent or from ethical wholesale, from local traders. Order via our website by noon on a Monday (no min spend) and pick up, or have your food delivered on Thursday.
